StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMepsScheduleForNwa]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @NwaID INT ) AS SELECT [SCHEDULE_ID], [NWA_ID], [MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID], [PROCESSING_DATE], [ARRIVAL_DATE], [UPDATE_DATE], [ASVAB], [SPECIAL_EXAM], [COMPLETE_PHYSICAL], [INSPECTION_PHYSICAL], [CONSULTATION_PHYSICAL], [CONSULTATION_TYPE], [CONTRACT], [DEP_HOLD], [SHIP], [OTHER_PROCESSING], [PROCESSING_STATUS], [LODGING_REQUIRED], [TRANSPORTATION_REQUIRED], [SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE], [LAST_PROCESSED_FOR], [PROCESSING_NOTES], [DELETED], s.PROJECTION_TYPE_ID, t.[DESCRIPTION], s.ASVAB_TEST_TYPE, s.MEDICAL_SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE, s.REEXAMINATION, s.MET_SITE FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[MEPS_SCHEDULE] s LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MEPS_PROJECTION_TYPE t ON s.PROJECTION_TYPE_ID = t.ID WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID AND DELETED = 'N';
